t: Amazon
s: Other sellers can list their items for sale on pages to which you have added your copyrighted images, even if you no longer sell that product. To ensure that you are not violating someone’s copyrights, make sure that you only upload images or text that you have created yourself or for which you have the copyright holder’s permission to upload.
